title: Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum

see-also.note: Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: United States of America

additional-notes: The first renewal mentioned here is the first with a CCE renewal record specifically mentioning this serial. It was filed under Books, not Periodicals.

This series consists of multiple subseries, many of which are published outside the United States. Contents of volumes in those subseries may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
